snippet: It is a well-known fact, at least it’s well known to the United States Bureau of Internal Revue, that an American citizen can write off a large proportion of expenses on his trip to Europe.
lead_paragraph: It is a well-known fact, at least it’s well known to the United States Bureau of Internal Revue, that an American citizen can write off a large proportion of expenses on his trip to Europe.

headline.main: Europe’s Lighter Side: Tax Deductions Made Easy
